Type.Name: ButtonPressEventHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ButtonPressEventHandler(object o, Gtk.ButtonPressEventArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Represents a method that will handle a button press event
Docs.remarks: The events is provided an value that contains the event data ().
